}

public Epic.OnlineServices.AntiCheatClient.AntiCheatClientViolationType : Enum {
public int value__
public AntiCheatClientViolationType Invalid
public AntiCheatClientViolationType IntegrityCatalogNotFound
public AntiCheatClientViolationType IntegrityCatalogError
public AntiCheatClientViolationType IntegrityCatalogCertificateRevoked
public AntiCheatClientViolationType IntegrityCatalogMissingMainExecutable
public AntiCheatClientViolationType GameFileMismatch
public AntiCheatClientViolationType RequiredGameFileNotFound
public AntiCheatClientViolationType UnknownGameFileForbidden
public AntiCheatClientViolationType SystemFileUntrusted
public AntiCheatClientViolationType ForbiddenModuleLoaded
public AntiCheatClientViolationType CorruptedMemory
public AntiCheatClientViolationType ForbiddenToolDetected
public AntiCheatClientViolationType InternalAntiCheatViolation
